fixes.name: Posgrado en no curso (¿pregrado?)
fixes.dax_expression:
CALCULATE(
    DISTINCTCOUNT('TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Número de cédula:]),
    'TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Posgrado en curso] = "No"
)
fixes.solution_explanation: The Tableau LOD { FIXED [Número de cédula:] : COUNTD(IF [Posgrado en curso] = "No" THEN 1 END) } returns a per-cédula indicator (1 if any row for that cédula has "No"). In DAX this is implemented by counting distinct Número de cédula: where Posgrado en curso = "No". The measure returns the count of unique cédula that meet the condition.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression is a FIXED LOD (aggregate across rows grouped by Número de cédula:), which maps to an aggregated measure in DAX.
